caption:
The photograph depicts a carnival game booth, with a woman standing behind the counter. She is wearing a yellow sleeveless top and a light-colored headscarf, and appears to be looking off to the side with a somewhat thoughtful expression. 

The booth itself features a game where players attempt to break balloons with darts to win a prize, as indicated by a sign that reads, "Brake 3 Balloons win a-Prize." The sign has a small spelling error ("brake" instead of "break"). A red background panel is visible behind the balloons, and multicolored balloons are attached in a scattered pattern, some already burst.

On the left side of the booth, various stuffed toys and other small prizes hang as potential winnings. They include stuffed animals and a few figurines wrapped in clear plastic bags. The structure of the booth is wooden, painted in red and dark tones, with a blue countertop where a few darts are lying.

Overall, the scene captures a typical moment at a fair or carnival, highlighting the leisure and entertainment aspects prominent in such venues.
title: Operator of dart-throwing, balloon-breaking concession at Bagnell Dam amusement strip
placename: Ozarks, Lake of the, State Park (Mo.)
location: Ozarks, Lake of the, State Park, Missouri
